title: كاش
method_description: اجعل زبائنك يدفعون نقداً (أو بمعنى آخر) الدفع عند الإستلام.

title.label: العنوان
title.description: وصف وسيلة الدفع الذي سوف يراه الزبون في صفحة إتمام الطلب.
title.tip: وصف وسيلة الدفع الذي سوف يراه الزبون في صفحة إتمام الطلب.

instructions.label: تعليمات
instructions.description: التعليمات التي سيتم إضافتها إلى صفحة الشكر.
instructions.tip: التعليمات التي سيتم إضافتها إلى صفحة الشكر.

enable_for_methods.label: التفعيل فقط لطرق الشحن
enable_for_methods.description: إذا كان الدفع عند الاستلام متاحاً لطرق معينة فقط، قم بإعداده من هنا. أو أتركه فارغاً لتفعيله لجميع طرق الشحن.
enable_for_methods.tip: إذا كان الدفع عند الاستلام متاحاً لطرق معينة فقط، قم بإعداده من هنا. أو أتركه فارغاً لتفعيله لجميع طرق الشحن.

إستلام محلي من المتجر.local_pickup: أي "إستلام محلي من المتجر" من الطرق
إستلام محلي من المتجر.local_pickup:2: saudia arabia – إستلام محلي من المتجر (رقم 2)

enable_for_virtual.label: قبول الدفع عند الإستلام إذا كان الطلب منتج افتراضي.

title: بطاقة خصم/ ائتمان
description: ادفع بشكل آمن من خلال خوادم PayTabs الآمنة.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

profile_id.label: Profile ID
profile_id.description: Please enter the "Profile ID" of your PayTabs Merchant account.
profile_id.tip: Please enter the "Profile ID" of your PayTabs Merchant account.

server_key.label: Server Key
server_key.description: Please enter your PayTabs "Server Key". You can find it on your Merchant’s Portal
server_key.tip: Please enter your PayTabs "Server Key". You can find it on your Merchant’s Portal

client_key.label: Client Key
client_key.description: Please enter your PayTabs "Client Key". You can find it on your Merchant’s Portal
client_key.tip: Please enter your PayTabs "Client Key". You can find it on your Merchant’s Portal

hide_shipping.label: Hide shipping info
hide_shipping.description: Enable if you wish to hide Shipping info of the customer in PayTabs payment page.
hide_shipping.tip: Enable if you wish to hide Shipping info of the customer in PayTabs payment page.

status_success.label: Captured Order status
status_success.description:
Set the Order status after successful payment.
Warning Be very careful when you change the Default option because when you change it, you change the normal flow of the Order into WooCommerce system, you may encounter some consequences based on the new value you set
status_success.tip:
Set the Order status after successful payment.
Warning Be very careful when you change the Default option because when you change it, you change the normal flow of the Order into WooCommerce system, you may encounter some consequences based on the new value you set

status_failed.label: Failed Order status
status_failed.description:
Set the Order status after failed payment.
Warning Be very careful when you change the Default option because when you change it, you change the normal flow of the Order into WooCommerce system, you may encounter some consequences based on the new value you set
status_failed.tip:
Set the Order status after failed payment.
Warning Be very careful when you change the Default option because when you change it, you change the normal flow of the Order into WooCommerce system, you may encounter some consequences based on the new value you set

ipn_enable.label: Allow IPN events
ipn_enable.description:
https://projects.dimofinf.net/wp-projects/E-APP/?wc-api=wc_gateway_paytabs
Copy the link provided and use it in the merchant's dashboard.
Supported events: Capture (Full), Void (Full), Refund (Full & Partial).
ipn_enable.tip:
https://projects.dimofinf.net/wp-projects/E-APP/?wc-api=wc_gateway_paytabs
Copy the link provided and use it in the merchant's dashboard.
Supported events: Capture (Full), Void (Full), Refund (Full & Partial).

restock_items.label: Restock refunded items (IPN)
restock_items.description: Refund isssued on PayTabs Dashboard will be reflected on your Store (if IPN option enabled), This option will Restock all the orders' items if the refund amount matched the remaining refund amount, So use carefully if there is a cross use between the Woo admin refund & PayTabs dashboard refund.
restock_items.tip: Refund isssued on PayTabs Dashboard will be reflected on your Store (if IPN option enabled), This option will Restock all the orders' items if the refund amount matched the remaining refund amount, So use carefully if there is a cross use between the Woo admin refund & PayTabs dashboard refund.

failed_send_note.label: Send a note on payment failure
failed_send_note.description: Send a note to the customer if the Order fail due to payment failure, The note contains the failure reason returned from the payment gateway.
failed_send_note.tip: Send a note to the customer if the Order fail due to payment failure, The note contains the failure reason returned from the payment gateway.

theme_config_id.label: Theme config id
theme_config_id.description: Config id of the theme/payment page (if any) you want to open, You may find it in Dashboard > Developers > PayPage Settings (Themes)
theme_config_id.tip: Config id of the theme/payment page (if any) you want to open, You may find it in Dashboard > Developers > PayPage Settings (Themes)

alt_currency_enable.label: Enable alternative currency
alt_currency_enable.description: Display alternative currency equivalent in the payment page.
alt_currency_enable.tip: Display alternative currency equivalent in the payment page.

alt_currency.label: Alternative currency
alt_currency.description: The alternative currency to be shown in the payment page, e.g. "USD", "AED, "SAR"
alt_currency.tip: The alternative currency to be shown in the payment page, e.g. "USD", "AED, "SAR"

enable_tokenise.label: Enable Tokenise
enable_tokenise.description: Allow your customers to save their payment methods for later use.
enable_tokenise.tip: Allow your customers to save their payment methods for later use.

trans_type.label: Transaction Type
trans_type.description: Set the transaction type to Auth or Sale
trans_type.tip: Set the transaction type to Auth or Sale

status_auth_success.label: Auth Order status
status_auth_success.description: Set the Order status if the Auth succeed.
status_auth_success.tip: Set the Order status if the Auth succeed.

payment_form.label: Payment form type
payment_form.description: Hosted form on PayTabs server is the secure solution of choice, While iFrame provides better customer experience (https strongly advised)
payment_form.tip: Hosted form on PayTabs server is the secure solution of choice, While iFrame provides better customer experience (https strongly advised)

options.redirect: Redirect to hosted form on PayTabs server
options.iframe: iFrame payment form integrated into checkout
